Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze.Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The Game class, which stores all of the game's information and player movement logic.

        Parameters:

        player - The player playing the game
        computerPlayers - The enemies of the game.

    • Method Detail

      • moveEnemies

        public void moveEnemies()
        Moves the enemies according to their tick rate. If the enemies' tick rate has been reach then allow them to move.

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer​(Game.DIRECTION direction)
        The player interacts with the block of the direction of their position. The player moves in that direction if possible.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction of the position that the player's current position is interacting with/moving towards.
